name: Simple elo
tagline: A simple gem for calculating elo ratings.
body:
### Welcome to SimpleElo

It really is simple:

```
player1 = {rating: 1500, k_factor: 20}
player2 = {rating: 1500, k_factor: 20}
SimpleElo.calculate_match(player1, player2, 1)
[1510, 1490]
```

SimpleElo was developed by @tomkr for the @brightin foosball app.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
